overview:
## Discussion

Following a successful share save by the system sharing UI in the provided [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKContainer], the system invokes this callback with a `nonnull` [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKRecord/ID], a `nonnull` share, and a `nil` error.

If a save failure occurs due to a per-item error like [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKError/Code/serverRecordChanged], the system invokes this callback with a `nonnull` `CKRecord.ID`, a `nil` share, and a `nonnull` error.

Each [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKSystemSharingUIObserver] instance has a private serial queue. The system uses this queue for all callback block invocations.

# systemSharingUIDidSaveShareBlock

**Instance Property**

A callback block the system invokes after the success or failure of a system sharing UI save.

## Declaration

```swift
@preconcurrency var systemSharingUIDidSaveShareBlock: ((CKRecord.ID, Result<CKShare, any Error>) -> Void)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Following a successful share save by the system sharing UI in the provided [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKContainer], the system invokes this callback with a `nonnull` [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKRecord/ID], a `nonnull` share, and a `nil` error.

If a save failure occurs due to a per-item error like [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKError/Code/serverRecordChanged], the system invokes this callback with a `nonnull` `CKRecord.ID`, a `nil` share, and a `nonnull` error.

Each [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKSystemSharingUIObserver] instance has a private serial queue. The system uses this queue for all callback block invocations.

## Accessing sharing blocks

- **systemSharingUIDidStopSharingBlock**: A callback block the system invokes after the success or failure of a system sharing UI delete.
